text: Pen Pelisi bɨ okok sek, Sajusi bɨ okok sek, kɨli kuŋay Jon yek ak apɨl, chɨnop ñɨg pakñaŋ agɨl apelak, kɨlop ag gɨl agak, Yoy salaw ñapay ne okol agak. God ne nɨbop tɨmel nɨŋɨd ag gɨnɨgab ak, an nɨbop agek, nɨbi anɨb awl pɨlɨk opɨm agak? Ñɨg pakon, God binɨb ogɨnap kɨlop ag gɨnɨgab ñɨn ak, chɨnop ma ag gɨnɨgab agɨl pɨlɨk opɨm akaŋ agak?
